Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>I thought you might be dropping by soon. Well?
Let's have a look at the flower you brought.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Ah, and it does seem to be a lovely one! Come,
let's go inside and spend some time admiring it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alas, you haven't brought one? Perhaps next
time, then.
